summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TATVGYA educational platform. Backend APIs working excellently (96.7% success rate). Frontend UI functional with proper navigation, admin dashboard accessible, and core features operational.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 200 instead of 201 for student registration
minor_bugs.impact: Functional but incorrect HTTP status code

ui_bugs.issue: CTA section selector timeout during testing

missing_features.issue: Google OAuth button not found during testing

passed_tests: Public stats endpoint with proper data structure
Subjects endpoint returning valid array with required fields
Articles endpoint with all filters (recent, trending, views, likes)
Homepage hero section with title and buttons
Homepage metrics section with animated counters
Homepage articles carousel with filter buttons
Homepage subjects grid with clickable navigation
Explore page header and search functionality
Explore page filter functionality (subject and sort filters)
Explore page article cards loading and display
Admin login flow and dashboard access
